title: The Vanishing Prototype
setting: Oriole Product Labs, design workshop, Wednesday 9 AM
premise: A working prototype for the company's flagship product launch disappeared from the locked display case overnight. The case was intact with no signs of forced entry.

suspects.name: Raj Anand
suspects.motive: Worried the prototype would expose a design flaw he missed
suspects.alibi: I left the office at 5:30 PM and went straight to my daughter's school recital. It started at 6 PM and ran until 8 PM. Then I drove home.

suspects.name: Leah Garner
suspects.motive: Wanted to delay the launch to align with her revised campaign timeline
suspects.alibi: I was at a dinner with our PR agency at The Olive Branch restaurant from 7 PM until around 10 PM. I paid with my corporate card and have the receipt.

suspects.name: Felix Dunn
suspects.motive: Believes a competitor offered him a job if he could deliver insider product details
suspects.alibi: I stayed late to clean the lab and left at 8 PM. Then I took the subway home to Greenfield, which is a forty-minute ride. I was home by 9.

suspects.name: Carmen Vega
suspects.motive: Furious about budget cuts that slashed her department's resources
suspects.alibi: I left at 5 PM and went to my evening yoga class at Harmony Studio. Class runs from 6 to 7:30 PM every Wednesday. The instructor knows me well.

clues.title: Night Guard's Rounds
clues.content: The security guard did a sweep at 11 PM and confirmed the prototype was still in the display case. His next sweep at 6 AM found it missing.

clues.title: Keycard Access Records
clues.content: Only three people have keycards to the display case: Raj, Felix, and the CEO. Building entry logs show Felix re-entered the building at 11:45 PM.

clues.title: Subway Schedule Check
clues.content: The Greenfield subway line shuts down for maintenance every Wednesday at 7 PM. There is no Wednesday evening service on that route.

hints.text: Look carefully at how each suspect claims to have traveled home that evening.
Does the claimed mode of transportation actually run on Wednesday evenings?
